completeListOfAbilities.desc: Melee attack\nSteals enemy's BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: Earthquake
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
Group melee  PG attack + group  PF attack
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
All targets: 4 turns 1 level of Stun (limit 5)
Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up I
Becomes Earthquake+ while enemies' total Stun level 5 or greater

ailments.name: MAX BRV Up
ailments.desc: MAX BRV Up: Raises MAX BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: Earthquake+
completeListOfAbilities.desc:
2-hit group melee  PG attack + group  PF attack
Deals extra BRV damage to targets afflicted with Stun 
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Low turn rate
Cancels all targets' Stun
Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up I

ailments.name: MAX BRV Up
ailments.desc: MAX BRV Up: Raises MAX BRV

completeListOfAbilities.name: Earthquake
completeListOfAbilities.desc:

All targets: 4 turns 2 levels of Stun (limit 5)

Becomes Earthquake+ while enemies' total Stun level 5 or greater

ailments.name: MAX BRV Up

passives.name: Earthquake Extension
passives.desc:
When using Earthquakeã€? Earthquake+:
 â€¢ Inflicts 4 turns DEF Down I

When using Earthquake:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Inflicted Stun level +1

When using Earthquake+:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%

With active buffs:
 â€¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ ( PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage; Inflicts 4 turns 1 level of Stun [limit 5])

passives.name: Debuffed Attack Boost Up
passives.desc: Moderately raises own MAX BRVã€? slightly raises own ATK while enemy is debuffed

passives.name: Homerun Swing Extension
passives.desc:
When using Homerun Swingã€? Homerun Swing+:
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted based on ATK

When using Homerun Swing:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 2; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 â€¢ Inflicted Stun level +1

When using Homerun Swing+:
 â€¢  PG attack hit count becomes 3; tremendously increased cumulative BRV damage
 â€¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 200%

With active buffs:
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (increases BRV based on ATK before  PF attack; inflicts 4 turns 1 level of Stun [limit 5])
passives.short_desc: Homerun Swing Extension: Boost to Homerun Swing
